p: The data from the above-mentioned pharmacological studies of vitamin C indicate that intravenous administration is currently the only way to achieve the optimal therapeutic concentration for the treatment of patients with severe illnesses such as viral pneumonia, ARDS, and sepsis. The treatment with a high dose of vitamin C should start with 10 grams and above per day. Also, the daily dose of vitamin C as a preventive agent should be started at 2000 mg and above.
